value.name: Former Balch Springs Police Officer Faces Murder Trial For Shooting Death Of Teen
value.description: Former Balch Springs police officer Roy Oliver is facing a murder trial in the 2017 shooting death of 15-year-old Jordan Edwards.

value.name: Judge Refuses to Dismiss Claims Balch Springs Police Violated Rights of Murdered Teen
